scripts.build: ncc build src/index.js -e eccrypto -e ripple-lib -o dist/
scripts.minify: terser --compress --mangle reserved=['Binary','Buffer'] -- dist/index.js > dist/index.min.js && mv dist/index.min.js dist/index.js
scripts.bundle: npm run build && npm run minify && ./clean-pkg.sh
scripts.publish: npm run bundle && npm publish dist
